Overall the course is well organized and easy to follow and full of great tips and resources.

Again a great course and I look forward more courses form this instructor.

results.content:
As the course title indicates this is a great tutorial for absolute beginners.

Ms. Farley takes the time to provide a foundation by explain the how's and why's behind building a simple web page.

She patiently explains how HTML and CSS elements are used to obtain specific results, how to layout the elements on a webpage, how to validate/verify that your code is correct and how to upload a website to the web.

Based on this course, I feel that I am ready to delve deeper into HTML and CSS to build more complex websites.

results.content: Kathleen does an excellent job in building out a basic web site and adding topics in short, consumable chunks.  She is very easy to understand and her digressions at various points offer very helpful, real-world examples and scenarios.  I highly recommend this course for anyone starting out and I look forward to seeing more courses from Kathleen Farley.  Thank you, Kathleen!
